name: Carve (itch)
description:
A game that I have made for my first ever game jam, the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1. Get a marble to the end of the level. You can make holes through the ground using your brush (hold left click to remove land). Then, press the green play button to drop the marble. Try to collect all of the coins on your way down!

(voxels are hard)
